=== About Me ===
<nowiki>[[File:arky.jpg | Arky | align="right"]]</nowiki>

I am a technologist, programmer and artist. I have been a gnu/Linux user, administrator and advocate from last 10 years. 

* Indian, lives in Hanoi, Vietnam. 
* Currently works as ICT Advisor <nowiki>[[http://ngocentre.org.vn|VUFO-NGO Resource Center]]</nowiki>
* Started using gnu/Linux in 1999 and later worked as sysadmin  
* Free Software advocate, long time volunteer for <nowiki>[[http://gnu.org.in | Free Software Foundation India]]</nowiki>    
* Co-founded <nowiki>[[ http:--bangalore.gnu.org.in|Free Software User Group-Bangalore ]]</nowiki>
* Area of interest: Accessibility (a11y), Documentation and Testing
